metadata.feature_description: Provides connector metadata including name, icon, category for display in the connectors management UI

steps.expected: Connectors page loads with list of available connectors
steps.actual: Connectors page loaded successfully showing all available connectors

steps.action: Locate Google Tag Manager in the connectors list
steps.expected: Google Tag Manager connector displays with name 'Google Tag Manager'
steps.actual: Google Tag Manager connector displayed with name 'GOOGLE TAG MANAGER' (uppercase is UI styling)

steps.action: Observe the icon displayed next to Google Tag Manager connector
steps.expected: Google Tag Manager icon (blue diamond/hexagon shape) displays correctly
steps.actual: Blue diamond/hexagon shaped GTM icon displays correctly next to the connector name

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify connector appears in Marketing category

steps.action: Review code to verify connector category assignment
steps.expected: Connector is assigned to Marketing (Marketting) category via ConnectorCategories.Marketting
steps.actual: Code review confirmed: Type => ConnectorCategories.Marketting in GoogleTagManagerConnector.cs line 41

steps.action: Verify connector appears in the connectors management UI
steps.expected: Connector is visible and accessible in the Connectors UI
steps.actual: Connector appears in the Connectors list and is fully functional with Connect button available

observations: The Connectors UI does not expose category filtering/labels visually - all connectors are displayed in a single alphabetically sorted list regardless of category
Code review confirmed connector properties: Name='GoogleTagManager', DisplayName='Google Tag Manager', Type=ConnectorCategories.Marketting, IsEngageConnector=false, SupportsMultiple=false
The connector icon is loaded from ~/DesktopModules/DnnCorp/Connectors/GoogleTagManager/Images/googletagmanager.png
Note: 'Marketting' is spelled with double 't' in the code (ConnectorCategories.Marketting) - this appears to be a legacy typo in the enum definition
